page.title: 04Ilmer Continued.
page.content: The few survivors emigrated to High Wycombe where the furniture trade needed new workers, and left their town to disappear into the fields and hedgerows, leaving little trace. In Ilmer there are two horticulture businesses, one a nursery garden selling thousands of christmas trees and the other, together with its poultry farm, selling direct to the public. The travelling library visits Ilmer once a fortnight. The children all have to travel by special bus to school. The social highlight of the year is the Church Fete on Spring Bank holiday monday, when many "outsiders" visit to join in the fun.
